title: Revenue generated by Rovio Entertainment 2010 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million euros has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million euros is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2015.
The line significantly increased by 69.1 from Year 2010 to 2011, and lastly, remained stable by 76.6 from Year 2011 to 2012.
The highest Revenue in million euros, of value 173.5 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Revenue in million euros about 6.5 was reached at Year 2010
